scripts.test: pnpm test:setup && pnpm test:unit && pnpm test:teardown
scripts.test:setup: k3d registry create machinist-test --port=5050 --image=ligfx/k3d-registry-dockerd:v0.6 --volume=/var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock --proxy-remote-url=* && k3d cluster create plt-machinist-test --registry-use=k3d-machinist-test:40035 --registry-config=k3d-registry.yaml
